What condition does Olivia Culpo have?
Endometriosis
What is endometriosis?
A condition in which tissue similar to the uterine lining, or endometrium, grows outside of the uterus
What is the average time it takes to receive a proper diagnosis for endometriosis?
Eight to 10 years
What helped relieve Culpo's pain in her lower back?
Applying heat
Which product does Culpo recommend for an effective bath?
Dr Teal's Pure Epsom Salt
What other product does Culpo use in her baths for easing swelling, stiffness, and pain?
Ancient Minerals Magnesium Bath Flakes
What type of heat source did Culpo find most effective for her lower back pain?
Hot water bottles
What specific hot water bottle does Culpo recommend?
Love Cashmere Hot Water Bottle from Naked Cashmere
Which online community did Culpo find support in?
Endo Warriors
What procedure did Culpo undergo to alleviate her endometriosis symptoms?
Surgery to remove endometrioma and insertion of the Mirena IUD
